title: Guard (Sinclair Mansion)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Guards of Sinclair Mansion are law enforcers who keep the Sinclairs under house arrest, both during Murder Mystery and King's Ransom. Talking to any of them starts the quest Murder Mystery. They also play a minor role during the King's Ransom quest.

Guard

NPC ID4218

The Guards of Sinclair Mansion are law enforcers who keep the Sinclairs under house arrest, both during Murder Mystery and King's Ransom. Talking to any of them starts the quest Murder Mystery. They also play a minor role during the King's Ransom quest.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
